options.content: # Sustainability Dashboard ### This dashboard shows the impact of **IBM Turbonomic** application resource manager on Energy consumption and Carbon Dioxide equivalents (CO2e) emissions in your on-premise and cloud data center environment.

panels.description: Yearly emissions for Scope 2.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  sum((e.attrs->>'num_cpus')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}/1000*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*(100-${PERCENT_RENEWABLE_ENERGY})/100*24*365 as "CO2e (t)"
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.provider_oid is null AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment='ON_PREM'
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: ðŸŸª Yearly CO2e Emissions - Scope 2 - On-Prem (t/year)

panels.description: Estimated average energy and emission savings from all Turbonomic suspend actions for Scope 2.
panels.title: ðŸŸª Estimated yearly Energy and CO2e Savings  - Scope 2 - On-Prem

panels.description: Yearly emissions for Scope 3.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  sum(m.current)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}/1000*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*24*365 as "CO2e (t)"
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.provider_oid is null AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment in ('CLOUD','HYBRID')
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: ðŸŸ¦ Yearly CO2e Emissions - Scope 3 - Cloud (t/year)

panels.description: Estimated average energy and emission savings from all Turbonomic suspend actions for Scope 3.
panels.title: ðŸŸ¦ Estimated Energy and CO2e Savings  - Scope 3 - Cloud

options.content: # Optimization Actions This dashboard shows the impact of IBM Turbonomic proposed actions.

panels.description:
Estimated average energy savings from all Turbonomic suspend actions for Scope 2 - On-Prem. 
Estimated energy savings are calculated based on the average energy over the selected time period for each one of the hosts that have a suspend action attached to them .
panels.title: ðŸŸª Actions - Estimated yearly CO2e Savings  - Scope 2 - On-Prem

panels.description: Positive values are savings, negative values indicate supplemental provisioning.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    DISTINCT e.name as "Host OID",
      e.environment as "Env",
pa.description,
  -1*avg((pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float) as "cores",
  -1*avg((pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY} as "Energy Avg (Wh)",
  -1*avg((pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*365*24 as "Energy Yearly(kWh)",
  -1*avg((pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*(100-${PERCENT_RENEWABLE_ENERGY})/100 as "CO2e Avg (kg/h)",
  -1*avg((pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (pa.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*(100-${PERCENT_RENEWABLE_ENERGY})/100*24*365/1000 as "Estimated Yearly CO2e (t)"
  FROM entity e 
  JOIN pending_action pa on pa.target_entity_id = e.oid
  WHERE
  --  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
    e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  pa.type in ('RESIZE') AND
  e.environment in ('ON_PREM')
  GROUP BY e.name, e.environment,pa.description

panels.title: ðŸŸª VM Suspend Actions Savings - SCOPE 2 - On-Prem

panels.description:
Estimated average energy savings from all Turbonomic suspend actions for Scope 2 - On-Prem. 
Estimated energy savings are calculated based on the average energy over the selected time period for each one of the hosts that have a suspend action attached to them .
panels.title: ðŸŸª VM Suspend Actions - Estimated yearly Energy and Cores Savings  - Scope 2 - On-Prem

panels.description:
Estimated average energy savings from all Turbonomic suspend actions for Scope 3 - Cloud. 
Estimated energy savings are calculated based on the average energy over the selected time period for each one of the hosts that have a suspend action attached to them .
panels.title: ðŸŸ¦ Actions - Estimated yearly CO2e Savings  - Scope 3 - Cloud

panels.description: Positive values are savings, negative values indicate supplemental provisioning.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DISTINCT e.name as "Host OID",
  e.environment as "Env",
  pa.description,
 avg((pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'afterActions'->>'capacity')::float - (pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'beforeActions'->>'capacity')::float)/1000 as "cores",
  avg((pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'afterActions'->>'capacity')::float - (pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'beforeActions'->>'capacity')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY} as "Energy Avg (Wh)",
  avg((pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'afterActions'->>'capacity')::float - (pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'beforeActions'->>'capacity')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*365*24 as "Energy Yearly(kWh)",
  avg((pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'afterActions'->>'capacity')::float - (pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'beforeActions'->>'capacity')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}/100 as "CO2e Avg (kg/h)",
  avg((pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'afterActions'->>'capacity')::float - (pa.attrs->'target'->'affectedMetrics'->'VCPU'->'beforeActions'->>'capacity')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}/100*24*365/1000 as "Estimated Yearly CO2e (t)"
FROM entity e 
JOIN pending_action pa on pa.target_entity_id = e.oid
WHERE
--  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
pa.type in ('SCALE') AND
  e.environment in ('CLOUD')
GROUP BY e.name, e.environment,pa.description

  UNION
    SELECT
    DISTINCT e.name as "Host OID",
      e.environment as "Env",
pa.description,
   avg((e.attrs->>'num_cpus')::float) as "cores",
  avg((e.attrs->>'num_cpus')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY} as "Energy Avg (Wh)",
  avg((e.attrs->>'num_cpus')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*365*24 as "Energy Yearly(kWh)",
  avg((e.attrs->>'num_cpus')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR} as "CO2e Avg (kg/h)",
  avg((e.attrs->>'num_cpus')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*24*365/1000 as "Estimated Yearly CO2e (t)"
  FROM entity e 
  JOIN pending_action pa on pa.target_entity_id = e.oid
  WHERE
  --  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  pa.type in ('DEACTIVATE') AND
  e.environment in ('HYBRID') AND
  e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
  GROUP BY e.name, e.environment,pa.description

panels.title: ðŸŸ¦ VM Suspend Actions Savings - SCOPE 3 - Cloud

panels.description:
Estimated average energy savings from all Turbonomic suspend actions for Scope 3 - Cloud. 
Estimated energy savings are calculated based on the average energy over the selected time period for each one of the hosts that have a suspend action attached to them .
panels.title: ðŸŸ¦ VM Suspend Actions - Estimated Energy and Cores Savings  - Scope 3 - Cloud

options.content: # Scope 2 ## Sustainability in the data center Scope 2 emissions are indirect emissions from the generation of purchased energy, from a utility provider. In other words, all GHG emissions released in the atmosphere, from the consumption of purchased electricity, steam, heat and cooling

panels.description:
This chart shows the number of active VMs in your on-prem environment, and tracks the data over the selected period. 
Active VMs - powered on and discovered by Turbonomic.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(e.name) as "Number of VMs"
FROM entity e
WHERE
  e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'  AND
  e.environment in ('ON_PREM')

panels.title: ðŸ’» Active VMs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  sum((e.attrs->>'num_cpus')::float) as value
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  e.environment in ('ON_PREM')
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

panels.description:
This graph shows the ration of number of active VMs per host over the selected period of the dashboard. 
Active VMs - powered on and discovered by Turbonomic.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  sum(m.current)/1000*count(e.name)/${CORES_CPU} as "Number of Cores"
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid"
join scope s on m.entity_oid = s.scoped_oid and s.finish > now() and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  s.seed_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  e.environment in ('ON_PREM')
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: ðŸ’» Active CPU Cores

panels.description: How many acres of forest per year will it take to sequester the total CO2e emissions released by physical machines in the selected scope and over the selected time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
sum(m.current)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*24*365*${EFFICIENCY} as value
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.provider_oid is null AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment='ON_PREM'
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: âš¡ Average Energy -All VMs (Wh/year)

panels.description: Total energy consumption in Watt-Hour of all hosts in the selected scope and during the selected time of the dashboard.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  sum(m.current)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*24*365*${EFFICIENCY} as value
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.provider_oid is null AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment='ON_PREM'
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: âš¡ Energy Consumption - All VMs (Wh/year)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  m.current/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY} as value,
  e.name as metric
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.provider_oid is null AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment in ('ON_PREM')
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: âš¡Average Energy Consumption (Wh) - Individual VM(s) - Scope 2

panels.description: How many acres of forest per year will it take to sequester the total CO2e emissions released by physical machines in the selected scope and over the selected time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  sum(m.current)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}/1000*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*(100-${PERCENT_RENEWABLE_ENERGY})/100*24*365 as "CO2e (t)"
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.provider_oid is null AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment='ON_PREM'
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: â›½ Average CO2e Emissions - All VMs (t/year)

panels.description:
CO2e emissions graph shows the CO2e emissions in metric tons (1 metric ton = 1,000Kg) for the hosts in the selected scope and over the selected period of the dashboard. 
CO2e emissions are calculated using Cloud Carbon Footprint open source methodology. See the Help section for more details.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  sum(m.current)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}/1000*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*(100-${PERCENT_RENEWABLE_ENERGY})/100*1000*24*365 as "CO2e (kg)"
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.provider_oid is null AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment='ON_PREM'
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: â›½ CO2e Emissions - All VMs (kg)
Average CO2e Emissions (t/year) - Individual VM(s) - Scope 2

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  
  (m.current)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*(100-${PERCENT_RENEWABLE_ENERGY})/100*24*365/1000 as "Estimated Yearly CO2e Avg (t)",
  e.name as metric
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment in ('ON_PREM')
ORDER BY 1

options.content: # Scope 3 ## Sustainability in the cloud Scope 3 emissions are all indirect emissions - not included in scope 2 - that occur in the value chain of the reporting company, including both upstream and downstream emissions. In other words, emissions are linked to the company's operations.

  --e.attrs->'targets'->0->>'type'

  e.name as metric
FROM metric m
JOIN entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.entity_oid IN (${HOST_LIST}) AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0 AND
  e.environment in ('CLOUD','HYBRID') 
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
# Sustainable IT Dashboard
***
## Summary
This dashboard shows the impact of IBM Turbonomic application resource manager on Energy consumption and Carbon Dioxide equivalents (CO2e) emissions in your private cloud data center environment. 

This dashboard focuses on data collected for physical machines (hosts) through a vCenter API and includes energy consumption data, number of hosts and VMs, VM-to-Host density ratios as well as the number and the type of generated host suspend and provision actions.
***

## Data and Methodology

**Energy (Wh)** - data is collected from vCenter API and summed over a period of 10 minutes to get a single number for total Energy (Wh) in 10 minutes. 

**CO2e emissions (t)** - carbon emissions calculations are made following an open source methodology outlined in Cloud Carbon Footprint website - [www.cloudcarbonfootprint.org](https://www.cloudcarbonfootprint.org/).    
Specifically, in this dashboard carbon emissions are calculated using the following formula:

    Operational Emissions = CO2e (t) = (energy consumption [Wh]) x ((private cloud average PUE) / 1000) x (private cloud emissions factor) x ((100 - percent renewable energy) / 100)

Where:

- ***Private Cloud Power Usage Effectiveness (PUE)*** = An average PUE of 1.67 is used in our calculations. This [451 report](https://d39w7f4ix9f5s9.cloudfront.net/e3/79/42bf75c94c279c67d777f002051f/carbon-reduction-opportunity-of-moving-to-aws.pdf) notes: "Adding it all up, the power usage effectiveness (PUE, the ratio of total datacenter power and the IT power) ranged from 1.63 to 1.70 in the survey sample and was consistent across company sizes. This is in line with broader industry data collected by the Uptime Institute but well below the efficiency of AWS operations." - 451 Research Report. We use the average of 1.63 and 1.70, which is 1.67.

- ***Private Cloud Emissions Factor*** = `1,562.4 lbs CO2/MWh Ã— (4.536 Ã— 10^(-4) metric tons/lb) Ã— 0.001 MWh/kWh = 7.09 Ã— 10^(-4) metric tons CO2/kWh`. We are using `0.000709` (rounded) in our calculations. ***Note:*** Emission equivalents vary slightly vs. EPA calculation because we are using the rounded numbers of the emissions factor (7.09x10^(-4)).

- ***Percent Renewable Energy*** = User can input the percent renewable energy that is used to generate the energy that is used by the datacenter in which physical hosts that are shown in this dashboard reside. CO2e emissions calculations will be adjusted by this input. 

**Density** - this chart shows the number of active VMs per host in your on-prem environment, and tracks the data over the selected dashboard time. 

**Estimated carbon sequestration equivalents** - real world examples of sequestration efforts to remove the total CO2e emissions reported in the *"CO2e Emissions (t) - All Hosts"* chart. ***Note:*** All sequestration equivalents and carbon emissions equivalents are adjusted for percent renewable energy inserted at the top of the dashboard.    
Sequestration formulas are as follow:

- ***Equivalent Carbon Sequestered by Acres of Forest in 1 year (metric tons CO2 / acre)*** = Total Emissions (metric tons CO2) * Acres of Forest Sequestration Factor.    
Where:    
Acres of Forest Sequestration Factor = -0.23 metric ton C/acre/year* Ã— (44 units CO2/12 units C) = -0.84 metric ton CO2/acre/year sequestered annually by one acre of average U.S. forest.

- ***Equivalent Carbon Sequestered by Tree Seedlings Grown for 10 years (metric ton CO2 / tree)*** = Total Emissions (metric tons CO2) * Tree Sequestration Factor.    
Where:    
Tree Sequestration Factor = (-36.4 lbs C/tree Ã— (44 units CO2/12 units C) Ã— 1 metric ton/2,204.6 lbs) = -0.060 metric ton CO2 per urban tree planted.

**Carbon Emissions Equivalents** - To calculate the carbon emission equivalencies we use the formulas provided by United States EPA Greenhouse Gas Equivalencies Calculator [here](https://www.epa.gov/energy/greenhouse-gases-equivalencies-calculator-calculations-and-references). Please note that there will be slight variation between the results you see in the dashboard and what is calculated by the EPAâ€™s site because we are using the numbers they have published, which they have rounded.
- ***Equivalent Passenger Vehicles*** = Total Emissions (metric tons CO2) * Passenger Vehicles Factor (metric tons CO2e/vehicles/year).    
Where:    
Passenger Vehicles Factor (vehicles/year) = 8.89 Ã— (10^-3) metric tons CO2/gallon gasoline Ã— 11,556 VMT car/truck average Ã— 1/22.5 miles per gallon car/truck average Ã— 1 CO2, CH4, and N2O/0.993 CO2 = 4.60 metric tons CO2e/vehicle/year.

- ***Equivalent Home Electricity Use*** - Total Emissions (metric tons CO2) * Home Electricity Use Factor.   
Where:    
Home Electricity Use Facto r= 11,880 kWh per home Ã— 947.2 lbs CO2 per megawatt-hour generated Ã— 1/(1-0.073) MWh delivered/MWh generated Ã— 1 MWh/1,000 kWh Ã— 1 metric ton/2,204.6 lb = 5.505 metric tons CO2/home.

list.definition:
select distinct
    name AS __text,
    oid AS __value
from entity
where
    type = 'DATACENTER'
    and attrs->>'targets' like '%vCenter%'
    and last_seen > now()
order by 1
list.label: Data Center
list.name: DATACENTER
list.query:
select distinct
    name AS __text,
    oid AS __value
from entity
where
    type = 'DATACENTER'
    and attrs->>'targets' like '%vCenter%'
    and last_seen > now()
order by 1

list.definition:
select distinct
    e.name AS __text,
    e.oid AS __value
from "scope" s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid"
where
    s.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
    and s.seed_oid IN (${DATACENTER})
    and e.last_seen > now()
order by 1
list.label: Cluster
list.name: CLUSTER
list.query:
select distinct
    e.name AS __text,
    e.oid AS __value
from "scope" s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid"
where
    s.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
    and s.seed_oid IN (${DATACENTER})
    and e.last_seen > now()
order by 1

list.definition:
select distinct
    e.name AS __text,
    e.oid AS __value
from "scope" s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid"
where
    s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'

    and e.last_seen > now()

order by 1
list.label: Host List
list.name: HOST_LIST
list.query:
select distinct
    e.name AS __text,
    e.oid AS __value
from "scope" s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid"
where
    s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'

    and e.last_seen > now()

order by 1

list.description: Private Cloud Emissions Factor corresponds to 1,562.4 lbs CO2/MWh Ã— (4.536 Ã— 10^(-4) metric tons/lb) Ã— 0.001 MWh/kWh = 7.09 Ã— 10^(-4) metric tons CO2/kWh

list.description: Each acre of forest captures that amount of ton of CO2 per year

list.description: Emission of ton of CO2 per passenger vehicles driven for 1 year
list.name: VEHICLE_EMISSIONS_FACTOR

list.description: Emission of ton of CO2 per household electricity consumption for 1 year
